entries.text: Thank you for calling Customer Support. Your call may be monitored for quality assurance. Please briefly describe the reason for your call.
Hi, I'm calling to return a product I recently purchased. It's not working as expected.
Hello, thank you for calling. I'm Agent Sarah, and I'd be happy to help you with your return. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with your purchase, please?
Thank you. I've pulled up your order. I see you purchased a WidgetPro 3000. Can you describe the issue you're experiencing?
Yes, it keeps shutting down randomly after only a few minutes of use. I've tried troubleshooting it, but nothing seems to work.

I understand. I'm sorry you're having trouble with your WidgetPro 3000. We can definitely process a return for you. To start the process, I will need to issue you an RMA number. Please write this down: RMA7890.
Okay, I've got RMA7890. What do I do next?

Great. Now, please ensure the product is returned in its original packaging, if possible, to protect it during shipping. Once we receive it, we'll process your refund according to our refund policy. You can find the full details of our refund policy on our website, but generally, you'll receive a full refund within 7-10 business days of us receiving the returned item.
Okay, that sounds good. How do I ship it back to you?

I'm going to email you a prepaid return label right now. Just print it out, attach it to the package, and drop it off at your nearest shipping carrier location specified on the label. Please include the RMA number clearly on the outside of the package as well.
Perfect! That makes things really easy. Thank you!
You're welcome! The email with the return label has been sent. Please allow up to 24 hours for it to arrive. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's everything. Thank you so much for your help. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome. We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
